name: Melting Pot (cmartins)
description:
This one was created for One Page Dungeon Contest 2022

Download and play it!
  • Adventure for Fantasy RPG
  • Agnostic System
  • One Page Dungeon
People believe the volcano and the gods are connected.
For the last few days, the volcano seems “unease” and the leader requested your help.  The prophecy says the Travellers will save the village. They trust you to go up there and talk with God!
 What do you do? How will it impact the village?

If you run the adventure, feel free to drop any comment or feedback - I would very much appreciated it.
